Posts.Content: I hear that sometimes its good to eat certain things while you are going through chemo. What's your thoughts on this, as I find it all a bit bewildering. Isn't enough to be on chemo without worrying about chemo or does it actually help certain side effects?
Posts.Title: What's best to eat while on Chemo??

Posts.Content: I will look at Mickey Dees in a different light. Sounds a definite in the future. Thanks. Mouth wash sounds good. So Mickey Dees and a cold lager sounds great. Well as you all say anything is worth a try. Well it won't be long and I will start chemo and see what takes my fancy. Many thanks. x
Posts.Title: What's best to eat while on Chemo??
